website_summaries.verdict: A ready-to-fly drone that's fun for beginners and experienced operators, too.
pros: Three racing modes work well for all skill levels, with an acrobatic mode for the most advanced
Lightweight and fast – goes up to 35 mph
Easy to wear the included FPV goggles even with eyeglasses
cons: Battery life isn't especially long – buying extra batteries to have on hand is recommended

customer_reviews.title: The FPV goggles and controller are not suited to fully grown adults
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure the quad is fine and the controller and goggles are perfect for smaller/younger people, but I could not use them. The goggles did not fit my head, not even close, and I couldn't focus on the picture. I don't wear glasses normally, but apparently, I need to! The controller is also quite small and perhaps not suited to a fully grown adult. If you're buying this for a smaller or younger person, I'm sure it's going to be great. If you're not smaller or younger, you might want to get a full-sized controller and try a different set of goggles. The quad itself, just look online for the reviews and you'll see it's generally pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Brendon

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite drone!
customer_reviews.text: First your gonna need extra batteries because this is a blasty, blast! I got 300 meters out of the goggles, on my big gps drone, and good picture. There is a fan in goggles and glasses fit inside perfect if your old like me. The perfect trainer for all levels or types of pilots. On my 8th flight in I'm in mode 2, so the learning curve isn't bad. Super stable powerful motors. Crashed into ground several times no problem. (Grass) A must have in your drone Arsenal!
customer_reviews.author: C Sumner

customer_reviews.title: Best on the market, I bought 3 !!
customer_reviews.text: I had a lot of these small, mid level, whoops and drones, with acro, or near acro, but as an overall package nothing comes close to EMAX Tinyhawk! Hands down for beginners or experts, this is the best! I fly full blown 220mm racing drones, but a lot of times I prefer something fun, responsive and reliable in a smaller package, look no further, buy this!!
customer_reviews.author: Gerald F.

customer_reviews.title: It's ridiculous how fun this thing is
customer_reviews.text: Fpv... It looked so fun, and after all the YouTube videos I watched, it almost started to look... easy. Problem was I knew it wasn't. I didn't wan to spend a small fortune on something that I knew I would either destroy, lose, or plain ol' suck at flying it. Enter Tinnyhawk! Fly indoors or out. Need a lil more pep? Betaflight can speed things up. And don't worry about crashing too much as this thing is almost indestructible. I highly recommend you try one for yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Drone flies great but very bad VTX
customer_reviews.text: The VTX breaks up after only 30 feet away from the goggles. and is that is if you are outdoors with nothing in your way if I was in my house the footage would break up when the drone was only one room over. the drone itself flies very smoothly and has decent flight times when flying LOS. But the fact that it does so terribly at fpv makes it not worth the price. I'm definitely returning it
customer_reviews.author: Mac Junky

customer_reviews.title: Take the dive (an honest review, for someone that was in my shoes)
customer_reviews.text: I was really hoping that this kit would meet me expectations- and it did!!!! I did a lot of homework to search for the best kit that experienced pilot recommended and this is indeed the one to buy as a beginner. I love that all the batteries are REMOVABLE, and replaceable. I have flown it ever day, and will soon be buying more batteries. I recommend watching several videos on Youtube to understand exactly what you are getting. I have zero complaints and look forward to countless hours of happy flying. Try it!
customer_reviews.author: R. Williams

customer_reviews.title: When something goes wrong you can get no help
customer_reviews.text: This is my third one and it will not trim can get no help from emax but Amazon has been letting me return them the other two kits had motor failure I bought them to fly not sit in the case so I will be sending this one back to if I can't get any help
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sweet drone!
customer_reviews.text: So far, no complaints. I have been very happy with the performance of the drone. It is a big step up from the ones you buy at local stores that a consumer grade, vs this one being more professional feeling. Very fast. Only complaint is that on of the fly settings is a little hard to learn. Most notably, the drone is programmed to flip if you push the right stick too far, so that can make it hard for a beginner to learn when trying to correct. Battery life is not that long, maybe 8 minutes, but they are cheap and you can charge any at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Larson

customer_reviews.title: Controller not operational. Returned
customer_reviews.text: Red flags immediately as the items in the case (not boxed) were not sealed in plastic. Seems this was a used item? Charged all batteries yet the radio controller would not power up even after trying 2 batteries. Never got off the ground, returning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BUY MORE BATTERIES
customer_reviews.text: I think this is easier to fly with FPV than it is line of sight. I’m not new to drones but this is my first mini racing style FPV quad. After just about 15 flights I can now fly on intermediate. Range seems to be fair and while sitting in my living room, I can fly out the door and maintain signal all around the outside of my SMALL house. I also picked up a 4 pack of additional batteries (pictured) which you will need since flight times can be between 2-4 mins depending on how you fly and which batteries you use. I love this thing!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Tra

customer_reviews.title: Great machine to learn to fly. Not easy to fix like you would think.
customer_reviews.text: First time replacing motors and the plug came completely off. Now I need a whole new circuit board.
customer_reviews.author: Mike V.

customer_reviews.title: $175 hobby flew away not to ever be seen again...
customer_reviews.text: My first flight. Without goggles so I could get a sense of this thing. Having flown camera drones for a while, the feeling of the controls was completely different. Didn't fee right. After about one minute of constant climbing and thrashing back and forth, a gust of wind picked it up and I never saw it again. Controls were useless. This was my first and last time with drone FPV. Too expensive for my taste.
customer_reviews.author: cdbm1967

customer_reviews.title: I can't say enough good things about this Tinyhawk
customer_reviews.text: There are plenty of better reviews out there for the Tinyhawk, so I'll just say: 1) Great for beginners. My wife was afraid to try it. I told her, you can't hurt it. That gave her the confidence to try it. 2) Still entertaining when you get more advanced. 3) Does well indoors and outside. 4) Turtle mode would be nice. This one doesn't come with it. You can update it. I think the newer ones do have it, so look for those.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Guy

customer_reviews.title: My favorite drone so far!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing! They say indoor use and while it’s possible I have way more fun outdoors with it. Even in the wind this little guy will hold steady. It is by far my favorite to fly! I definitely recommend this setup to anyone. For no visible antennas it has awesome range too. Also it even has beginner, intermediate, and acrobat mode. Mine came with a six slot charger so I definitely recommend getting some spare batteries. I would say definitely make the purchase you won’t regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great fpv starter
customer_reviews.text: Don't expect dji autopilot features. This thing is wild. It's fun for my kids & me, but it's not for the faint of heart. Steep learning curve to master, but easy to play with. Buy extra batteries because they last <5minutes. The goggles and controller use commonly used rc frequencies so you could upgrade to a bigger/faster drone without upgrading those if you get into it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen G.

customer_reviews.title: The best $164 I've ever spent!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best $164 Ive ever spent. This thing is a ton of fun. I first started out in stability mode and perfected my flying indoors. Now I am able to fly in acro outdoors and cant get enough. I highly recommend buying several batteries. Great for Indoors and outdoors. Ive broken several frames over the few months I've had it but swapping frames is cheap and easy. If I had more money I'd buy one for everyone I know.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Key

customer_reviews.title: Get batteries!!!
customer_reviews.text: Firstly, get batteries!!! Get all the batteries and then get some more!!! What I love about this drone is that it is DURABLE!!! I'm especially a fan of the props. The design is tough. Normally that is a weakness of beginning level drones, but not here. The body is well designed, and built too. Crazy nimble in the air. The bind process is unusual and not well explained, and a definite downer is the necessity of unplugging the motor and rebinding every time you crash.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hot glue the camera in place before you fly, things will break
customer_reviews.text: If you try doing something crazy with the drone and you take a good spill the plastic holding you camera in place might snap off so glue that before you fly. Also if you are beginning drone flying dont start inside you will be hitting the ceiling, then the floor, then the ceiling and so on start outside before you move on to inside.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Support is terrible.
customer_reviews.text: Really poor experience, which left a bad taste in my mouth, would have been a good drone had they returned it, but they kept the unit. Now i'm stuck with the rest of the kit, since support was so incompetent they never returned the drone!
customer_reviews.author: Roveen I.

customer_reviews.title: 1 month of owning it..i thought it was durable
customer_reviews.text: i love this drone,,looking to buy the 2s but of course my tinyhawk broke the day after the warranty even though gadgetbing is an awesome company and have taken care of m,e before,,just want to know if i can somehow fix mine..the place female part broke of the board that you plug the motor into..any guidance would be great,,ive done alot of research and seems as if im the first...
customer_reviews.author: samantha

customer_reviews.title: Go buy a TinyHawk 2
customer_reviews.text: It's a really durable sucker. I've thrown this all across the place, and I've thrown in into walls at full speed, still flying. The camera mount is god aweful, and you'll have to keep putting it into place. I have flown the TinyHawk 2, everything that is wrong with this, they fixed with it. I'm literally writing this on my way to buy it for myself. Don't make my mistake, go buy the second one.
customer_reviews.author: FErlenbusch

customer_reviews.title: Awesome first quadcopter for myself
customer_reviews.text: This is my first quadcopter and I'm amazed...such a cool starter kit. The product arrived in a timely manner and was packaged well,no damage . I had it up and running in 10 minutes , though being my first time flying I bounced off the cieling and dislodged the camera from it's mount,but snaped right back in place. The tinyhawk seems very resilient to impacts. In my opinion as a noob to quads, this is a perfect starter kit.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Lambert

customer_reviews.title: Not for beginners.
customer_reviews.text: Not quite what I expected. Great little drone if you have a bit of exp but if this is your first drone you can forget about flying this thing with the goggles. It’s near impossible to figure out. The fov is really small. The drone itself is good however and the controller is good.
customer_reviews.author: CaldwellOne

customer_reviews.title: Different battery charger than the one shown
customer_reviews.text: Great quadcopter RTF kit, although I received a different battery charger than the one shown in pictures and in description. Mine doesn’t have the option to change the amperage rate for charging. No way to get in touch with seller. Charger works but not sure if the one they show is a newer model and I received the older model or the one they show is the older model and I received the updated one. Idk
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: A great intermediate learning drone.  Can be flown outside.
customer_reviews.text: This was the best for your money. Very durable. Great to upgrade to and from. Goggles could be more comfortable but are comparable with drones you may build. Can fly this with FRSKY Tarranis controller so I never used the one it came with...but it works.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Emax Tinyhawk
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Everything came in a lot sooner than expected and I’m super pleased this far! I did a lot of research prior to purchasing a FPV set up and this is by far the best way to go for a first time person not sure if they want to take the full jump into the hobby. Already looking into more batteries and upgrades.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: BACKUP IN BETAFLIGHT BEFORE CHANGING SETTINGS!!
customer_reviews.text: This was my first FPV experience and, honestly, it was perfect out of the box! I got a little ahead of myself and ignored the warnings to backup my config before changing rate settings etc. but after a day of sorting out an arming issue, I was back to ripping around my house (for now). Overall, the system works beautifully together. The transmitter was a little easier, for me, than a bulky block style transmitter. The goggles had my heart pumped after the first flight! Good aspect ratio, signal strength, etc. It does, however, get a bit heavy on the neck after flying about 4 batteries in a row. Would recommend! (Googly eyed drone shot VERY related, btw)
customer_reviews.author: zakk

customer_reviews.title: mine didn't last very long
customer_reviews.text: I was happy until the second time we went to fly it, first time we flew about 6 packs now it will only bind and arm 1 out of like 10 power cycles of the battery weird everything looks good in beta flight but rarely works. I now feel like I wasted 160 bucks trying to get my kid into the hobby with me and he's been really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Buy
customer_reviews.text: It stopped working after the forth test flight and really wanted it to work so searched up what could be wrong with it and a bunch of things popped up all saying it had a problem with the transmitter and the connection with the battery so I checked all batteries and they were perfect so it was the drone itself! Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Evan T.

customer_reviews.title: Appears to be a used item. Did not function.
customer_reviews.text: Have not flown this. I will update this when I do. I opened the package and it looks as if it is a used unit. There appears to be grass stains on the frame around the blades. Hopefully the unit works and doesnt have bad motors. At this point I'm pretty disappointed. Update: product did not work. Goggles did not function. Drone would not operate. Controller had a very sensitive charging port. I have ordered a replacement and hopefully the "new" one will be better. I'll update after I have received it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fast little bird!
customer_reviews.text: I'd say not so much for indoor unless your in a warehouse or factory. Great little bird. Not my first pick for someone just starting out. If you can fly a micro with throttle management then this will be great for your next bird. Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Video feed range isn't good enough
customer_reviews.text: If you fly in a park this thing is great. However outside my house with neighboring wifi etc. this thing loses video feed at only 30 yards. I also wish this thing could record your flight video.
customer_reviews.author: Supermongol

customer_reviews.title: Flies great
customer_reviews.text: This was my first FPV drone and I love it. Flies so smoothly and is a lot of fun.
customer_reviews.author: John Sez

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: The first one I received had a an issue where the video would cut out in the fpv goggles after about 15 feet I s my it back as a defective product and got a replacement. The replacement is fine and works as advertised. Drone flies great! My only complaints it the fpv goggles sit on my face where I can't see the very bottom of the screen not a huge deal can still see to fly fine.
customer_reviews.author: James King

customer_reviews.title: Great for flips, trick, indoor, outdoor, and EVERYTHING!
customer_reviews.text: My first one didn’t come binded, so I requested a replacement and the next day it was here. This drone is great for indoor and out door flying and EXTREMELY durable! It also has sooooo much power for a 1s drone so wind (in acro mode) barely affects it. Great drone and would recommend but make sure to buy extra batteries for it.
customer_reviews.author: Emely Solis

customer_reviews.title: Great little FPV quad
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly. Only thing you have to really know is after a few light crashes the FPV camera comes loose and you need to place some foam inside to keep it from moving around. 4 stars due to this
customer_reviews.author: HamDude

customer_reviews.title: Poor customer service
customer_reviews.text: Terrible customer service. My drone arrived and would flip backwards on takeoff. It wouldn’t be a problem if I could speak to someone by phone but EMAX won’t do that. They proposed I send them pictures of my problem (what good is that?). When I requested a return for a faulty product they refused to pay return shipping. They took seven days to respond to my messages.
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money!  Flawed design!
customer_reviews.text: The drone brokeafter 2 days. A motor seemed to stop working on one part. I saw another video on here showing the very same thing. obviously this is a design flaw. Do not waste your money. I tried to contact seller, no response.
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana M. Haddawy

customer_reviews.title: Not for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because of all the reviews online saying this is good for beginners. It's very difficult to fly. I tried taking it out to a field to learn how to fly and the drone shot up a few hundred feet and I never saw it again.
customer_reviews.author: Lance rogers

customer_reviews.title: Start small with this guy.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the emax baby hawk thinking I could just learn on that. I was wrong. I learned the basics on this little guy and I’m still learning but I was finally able to fly the bigger size baby hawk without crashing it because of this tiny hawk. If I could do it all over I would have started with this little guy first. I fly it outside on calm days. Definitely worth the money and a lot of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: IT sucks!
customer_reviews.text: This thing simply sucks. Returning it asap. It does not last more than 5 minutes. The head on display is so crappy and cheaply made that it shutters the signal into the black hole.
customer_reviews.author: Hakeristi

customer_reviews.title: Great Entry Level Drone
customer_reviews.text: This is a great drone for beginners to get into the hobby. Price is very reasonable and great bang for the buck. The Tinyhawk is very durable and withstands crashes. Great for practice, and great for some beginner races too. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: 4 minutes flying time tinyhawk
customer_reviews.text: This hawk come a completed ,with a transmitter(controller), we don't have to go through a headache set up and bind steps like other models. There is a stick, you just pull up to arm the motor, then you can fly, it is an entertainment. The design is impressed, reversed and the motors can hold the blades secure. Price is ok
customer_reviews.author: Tuan bolsa

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware of the Goggles,  No Good!
customer_reviews.text: The goggles died after 2 days. What should I do now?
customer_reviews.author: AMAZON'S King of the Jungle!!!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for beginners!
customer_reviews.text: I used this as my first step in the racing drone experience. love it! Bought four more batteries to go with it and have now enjoyed many weekends of laps in the yard! 5/5. (green propellers are not stock)
customer_reviews.author: Jayson

customer_reviews.title: Battery pack for goggles not included
customer_reviews.text: Instructions in kit state to charge the battery pack for the FPV goggles, but it was not included. This was a present for my nephew, and he could not use it on his birthday.
customer_reviews.author: guko

customer_reviews.title: Broke after one flight
customer_reviews.text: My son received this as an early birthday gift. We flew it once and it broke. It was past the return time so now I’m out $180.00 and he doesn’t have his birthday gift. Very disappointing. He has had a few different drones and this by far was the worst one even though this is the one he was most excited about receiving.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Good for swoopin’
customer_reviews.text: Not cheap but everything is plug and play. The drone can take a beating too! Crashed a lot and it is still swooping! Get extra batteries
customer_reviews.author: Alex Belcastro

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner package
customer_reviews.text: I bought this package for my father who is just starting his FPV journey. It comes set up perfect for someone just getting started.
customer_reviews.author: mark lillo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome mini whoop!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first FPV quad and I have to say I’m super impressed with the durability. I’ve crashed this thing dozens of times with no issues. Even after taking a swim in a pond it still flies like a champ. I would definitely recommend getting at least 10 extra batteries as the flight time is only 4 minutes. The only flaw I see is the weak video from the VTX. If you are competent with a soldering iron you can easily remedy that issue.
customer_reviews.author: Brian schmidt

customer_reviews.title: It’s a blast
customer_reviews.text: This is a blast for beginners. This is my first small racing drone and I cannot believe I have not bought one before.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect package to into FPV
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product for the price. I have flown a few different drones over the past few years but never FPV. It only took me two batteries to get the hang of it. This drone is very responsive and fine tuned right out of the box. I would recommend this to anyone who has flown larger GPS drones or for anyone looking for a great new hobby.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa A. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the hassle.
customer_reviews.text: Quite easily the most frustrating, confusing device ever made. Poor instructions, no support whatsoever. I do not recommend this product,in fact stay away from it.
customer_reviews.author: fifel

customer_reviews.title: A lot of drone in a small package
customer_reviews.text: A lot of drone in a small package. Great for beginners to the FPV scene, but you’ll outgrow it quickly. Make sure you buy extra batteries, because this thing eats them. Headset is not uncomfortable, but is definitely small on people with bigger heads like me.
customer_reviews.author: Cassin Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: I am brand new to the hobby and have only had it for2 weeks. But in these 2 weeks I’ve learned that this drone can take some serious hits and keep moving. It also flys outside very well just make sure there isn’t any wind. Aside from that I’m now hooked on getting better and moving up in the FPV drone world.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Bruno

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic. Once t you get the basics down go and configure the Mockingbird setting. Flies wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: FireFly

customer_reviews.title: Needs a computer to set up to calibrate.
customer_reviews.text: I like it for my grand son. Not easy set up. He is still working on setup. He does not have a home computer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for beginners!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect racing drone for beginners. It comes with everything you need to start. This will get you flying fpv asap. The quad itself is very durable. It's extremely lightweight and very fast. I've gotten speeds of 45mph with this exact set up.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna J. Beauchamp

customer_reviews.title: Good product very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Good product very satisfied. It's definitely a wild ride . good for learning and experienced Flyers
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great way to start flying FPV ready to go out of the box definitely recommend more batteries
customer_reviews.author: John b.

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little set up I love it for my first one it’s a great bye wish the goggles was a little better
customer_reviews.author: Neal

customer_reviews.title: very nice and easy to fly
customer_reviews.text: perfect easy to fly easy learn but not really for beginners only if you experience to fly a quad already.
customer_reviews.author: marvin

customer_reviews.title: Tiny hack
customer_reviews.text: Hi I’ve been trying to get this to work and every single time the controller keep beeping and it won’t fly I want a replacement or how can I return this for a full refund!
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect into drone
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the beginner. Everything you need. Buy extra batteries because you will love it. Very durable and has taken a beating as I learn. Rates turned up and flies beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Von Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money.
customer_reviews.text: Great starter pack for beginners or a fun addition to a growing fleet. Nice case to hold all the gear.
customer_reviews.author: Neil Smalley

customer_reviews.title: Best tiny whoop FPV ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is soo awesome!! You can't get a better setup for this money! Seriously, everything works so great! Such a great entry level setup for flying FPV. It also can take a ton of crashes!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Goggles broken
customer_reviews.text: my goggles broke in a day. they only show a black screen full charged only fan turns on not the screen
customer_reviews.author: kvanprooyen

customer_reviews.text: The tinybwhoop is awesome in all aspects. Downfall is the googles are too small and don’t fit correctly on me. The controller is a little awkward and feels like a Xbox controller. Good start for beginners with the value but strongly suggest picking up a good controller as well as googles if you plan on advancing quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan classen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Little Quad
customer_reviews.text: Perfect starter kit for trying out FPV. Buy more batteries. If you get hooked upgrade your remote and get a simulator. Otherwise this is a great place to start.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun All-in-One Product for Learning to Fly!
customer_reviews.text: I had a lot of fun with this as someone new to quads. Quality of everything was great minus one minor issue with the power cable going to the goggles. Friends and family have put this thing through the ringer and it has still stayed together great!
customer_reviews.author: Albert Engelbrecht

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: My grandson really enjoys the drone. With the extra batteries he has more time to fly.
customer_reviews.author: Rena Morris

customer_reviews.title: Good quality drone for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good drone. I had a problem with my drone after a minor crash. The camera became unseated and a motor connector was detached from the board (faulty soldering joint?). I found customer service to be easy to contact and deal with, but am still working on getting the problem resolved.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Oakley

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Fun and easy to fly after you get use to the controller.
customer_reviews.author: Takashi Sakai

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the money great value, poor QC
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing but my fpv goggles were broken and I was missing the extra set of props, and charger but I had my own lipo charger,besides that it flies great , great for beginners and experienced alike
customer_reviews.author: NW_RC_KRAWLER

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy
customer_reviews.text: Worst purchase ever.... all I got was the drone itself. No controller, no goggles, waste of money... Amazon, you fricken owe me!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Most fun drone ever
customer_reviews.text: I collect drones and used to work for the near by hobby shop. This is the best drone I have ever flew. It is so much fun. I have other fpv drones that r going to collect dust. The only thing is. It should have came with 2 batteries. When u buy this. Buy extra batteries
customer_reviews.author: kurt irwin

customer_reviews.title: Not that great
customer_reviews.text: First one came broken, we exchanged it and the camera broke on second one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product and fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: This TINYHAWK is so awesome and is great for beginners and pros alike ... Feels so smooth to fly ...
customer_reviews.author: FPVjj

customer_reviews.title: Tank strong
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for anyone learning, I've beat the hell out of mine and no problems yet. And I do mean beat the living f*** out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Theiz Spurlock

customer_reviews.title: Suspicious seller
customer_reviews.text: I’m really suspicious that I got a used bundle. It didn’t come in a box, the interior foam was ripped in several places, and the camera was not set to factory settings. Great product, finds different seller.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Slinker

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: If you are thinking of an entry level kit, I would highly recommend it. I bought the rtf kit then an upgraded Tinyhawk S because of how much I loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Cole

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend this
customer_reviews.text: I got this thanking I can learn how to fly. It just ever way made bad
customer_reviews.author: Fabian

customer_reviews.title: Issues with the video
customer_reviews.text: The product is nicr for indoor training. However after few hours of flying, the goggles video is no more working. I tried other googles and I can receive the images, so the TX is surely fine. Anyone with the same issue?
customer_reviews.author: P. Imperato

customer_reviews.title: Company was there because my kit was without a battery. Replace in 3 days.
customer_reviews.text: Cool kit. Everything you need to start out. Great for me as a beginner FPV flyer.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie B

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: The first one we got wouldn’t charge. Then we got a second one to replace the first one and it was broken in two places. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Lot of technology for the price
customer_reviews.text: Kicks ass! Too light for any breeze tho. I would try a tandem series battery mod
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Great flier/Even better customer service
customer_reviews.text: With a little tuning the thing flies great. A great way to get into the hobby. Flight board went bad after 2 weeks but they are sending a full replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your time and money
customer_reviews.text: 1st drone came defective and wouldn't arm, ordered a replacement, kit came used as controller was broken/dirty and it came WITHOUT THE DRONE.
customer_reviews.author: Marcela

customer_reviews.title: Idk
customer_reviews.text: I flew it a couple times. Now having issues connecting to the receiver
customer_reviews.author: Mark Maynard

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tiny whoop
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little whoop if you're into Fpv it's a little beast. It's a lot of fun to fly I would recommend it to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Nice little drone package
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a friend, product was exactly as described. It arrived fast as well. My friend has been pretty happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Shane A Obert

customer_reviews.title: Damaged yaw buttons
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for beginners and the yaw buttons are not working properly. It's hard to fly when you cannot control direction. Is there any way we can resolve this issue
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great product for entry lvl pilots
customer_reviews.text: Having so much fun with my tinyhawk I would recommend this to any beginner. Charged it up and flew it right after it was ready only downside comes with a single 1s Lihv battery so the fun was short lived initially
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Otine

customer_reviews.title: Good gift idea
customer_reviews.text: The item work great everything wasn’t damage the case has foam for the item good idea as a gift for any kids
customer_reviews.author: jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a gift for my boyfriend and there began his hobby of flying race quads. He loves it! Expensive hobby but worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Ellis

customer_reviews.title: It will break, it’s not titanium, YURD?
customer_reviews.text: This will break in about a month of trying not to crash. Pretty much everything you could ask for at this price, 10/10 but Buy more batteries.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: good starter kit
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup takes some practice to fly make sure you order more batteries for the drone istelf.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fpv racer
customer_reviews.text: Just getting into fpv flying so far about 5 flights no problem whatsoever doing pretty good loving this little drone
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Worthless unless mine is defective
customer_reviews.text: Flew it once, then I lost connection between the controller and the quad and will no longer rebind. Garbage!
customer_reviews.author: Trent D

customer_reviews.title: *****BATTERY CAUGHT FIRE AND EXPLODED*****
customer_reviews.text: UNSAFE PRODUCT!!! Battery in the remote caught fire and exploded!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: LeeAnn Hubbard

product_meta.title: EMAX Tinyhawk RTF Micro Indoor Racing Drone with FPV Goggles and Controller for Beginners
product_meta.description:
The tinyhawk RTF is a perfect FPV drone to start the hobby, it is easy to fly and made out of durable comnponents and plastics to ensure long lasting quality. With its 3 racing modes, you will learn how to fly FPV in no time. The controller is set up with 3 diffrent modes to help you get started, the right switch on the controller is porgrammed with Level mode, Horizon mode, and Full Acrobatic mode for full control. The RTF kit includes a lightweight and durable FPV goggles. No cellphone or wifi needed, as this is real FPV that will get you much further than wifi receivers. The goggles, controller and tinyhawk will be bound and will be ready to fly out of the box. The kit comes with 1 battery. 1 set of extra propellers, and a bag of spare crews and battery connecvtor. All in all it is a great beginners drone, that will get you started with FPV in the right, and affordable direction. 

- Up to 4 minutes flight time on single battery 
- Unique inverted motor design to keep CG as low as possible to fit in the smallest of spaces 
- 25mw VTX and 600tvl Camera included for fun FPV flight via FPV style goggles 
- Smart Audio function to change VTX channel via your transmitter - Pre-tuned from factory with expert pilots and new pilots in mind. 3 rate profile 
settings for all types of flying feel
- Plug in type motors for easy maintenance
- 1s High Voltage (HV) 450mah lipo included
- Frsky compatible D8 receiver built in to FC
- Custom carbon fiber themed carrying case 

The Ready-To-Fly kit includes the following: 

1 x Tinyhawk FPV Racing Drone
1 x Light weight soft carry case, with carbon fiber look
1 x USB High Voltage capable 4 port USB Charger
1 x 1s High Voltage (HV) 450mah lipo battery
1 x FPV Goggles 
1 x Transmitter
1 x USB Cable for charging goggle, radio
1 x Parts Bag
1 x Phillips screwdriver
2 x 18650 Battery already pre-installed
1 Set spare AVAN Tinyhawk 3 blade propellers.
feature_bullets: Kit in cludes FPV goggles, Controller and Tinyhawk drone, all ready to fly!
Great for beginners! No extra gear needed to start flying!
Real FPV, NOT WIFI. Up to 200 feet distance!
Lightweight, durable, and fast! Up to 35mph!
Easy to carry case, no need for a heavy backpack to carry all in one!
